description:
Veldora is a powerful dragon who befriended the young http://anidb.net/ch96306 [Rimuru]. He was trapped in an "Endless Prison" by a beautiful Hero, when he was distracted by her looks and was freed by Rimuru, when Rimuru took him into his storage space, so that they could jointly analyze the Endless Prison spell to break it.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Veldora
